intro: Robbairea prostrata, commonly known as the prostrate robbiairea, is a flowering plant native to South America. It is a low-growing shrub that typically reaches a height of only a few centimeters. The plant features small, pale yellow flowers that bloom in clusters along the stems. Its leaves are simple, opposite, and covered in a fine, silvery pubescence. Robbairea prostrata thrives in well-drained soil and is often found in rocky or arid environments.
